channel.title: What coding company would you work for if you could?
channel.description: Personally for me. . . jagex. I like blizzard more as a company, but i like the oh so golden JMOD crown

item.title: What coding company would you work for if you could?
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:5, topic:289603”][quote author=Colton_Java link=topic=382803.msg2874569#msg2874569 date=1247969832]
Personally for me. . . jagex. I like blizzard more as a company, but i like the oh so golden JMOD crown
[/quote]I wouldn’t work for a company where everything implemented is ridiculed and hated by the players. If we’re talking gaming: Blizzard always.[/quote]

LOL!

You’re stupid enough to think people don’t COMPLAIN about Blizzard?

Blizzard gets way more complaints about WoW (in terms of meaningful complaints, not the bullshit retarded crying Runescape gets) than Runescape EVER will.

Read full topic
item.source: What coding company would you work for if you could?

item.title: What coding company would you work for if you could?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Google.com, unfortunately though they have multiple programming jobs I am qualified for, the closest office to me is in Pittsburgh, PA, which is about 4 hours away, too far…

I live 20 mins from Pittsburgh. There’s a nice house for sale up the street from me

As for my pick, I’d say Naughty Dog. Some of the greatest games have been made by them (Jak series, Crash Bandicoot, Uncharted).

Read full topic

item.title: What coding company would you work for if you could?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:34, topic:289603”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=382803.msg2874807#msg2874807 date=1247982219]
Google.com, unfortunately though they have multiple programming jobs I am qualified for, the closest office to me is in Pittsburgh, PA, which is about 4 hours away, too far…
[/quote]

WOW loool im 4 hours from the nearest damn wal mart xD

ontopic
tbh id prefer to work for epic game studio’s (gears of war 2) or the studio from [prototype]
if its a cp programming job tbh theres nothing really big or important you could gain, theres JaGex, but its all business as stated above somewhere, and then wow but wow graphics fails, if i HAD to choose between the two, id honestly would say JaGex b.c the main office, W.E i believe is in the u.k xD[/quote]

Jagex only has offices in the UK. Cambridge Business Park, they are number one. (the building is number one).
